Content.Data:
TEAM Mentor supports WikiCreole as its markup language for editing WikiText type articles. WikiCreole was developed by taking multiple wiki markup languages and choosing the best of the breed.  By using this easy to understand language, TEAM Mentor allows wider audiences, including users that donâ€™t have explicit TEAM Mentor training, to contribute their knowledge. 

Related Items 

For more in-depth information on WikiCreole language see:
http://wikicreole.org/wiki/Creole1.0
